title: crypto/X509: tbsCertificate struct has wrong default version value.
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?

1.6.3
2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?
OS X El Capitan 10.11.6

3. Issue
According to RFC5280 Section 4.1.  Basic Certificate Fields
The default version should be version 1. Or int 0. 
In Golang x509 library, the default is set to int 1, which means Version 2.
